You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &latail;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&lAtail;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/291b/index.htm U+0291B].
  * `&latail;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2919/index.htm U+02919].
